I bought this game a few years back and I immediately fell in love with it. From the witty tooltips to the challenging combat, the game overall feels very polished and well thought out. This game is definitely worth the money, and deserves the awards and titles it has. Buy it, and I promise you won‚Äôt regret it!
Ok I‚Äôm just gonna say it I love the game and I completed it and the only problem is there isn‚Äôt enough

This game has a balance of crafting, creativity, adventure, and action! You can build your base while exploring this creative world. Some games take a while to have all of the action. But when you play the  game an alien blows up your ship real quick! You get crashed and you are stranded! I would pay $7 to get this game. This was probably the best game I played of 2019!
This game is so addictive and is so much fun I am in love with this game you should try it out it is so much fun and one of the best games I ever had the chance 5/5 stars and they deserve it

title.label: The 1st iOS game I purchased & I couldn‚Äôt have picked a better one...

content.label: I bought Crashlands when it 1st came to the App Store as my 1st game ever for iOS & a few years & 20-30 games later, it still continues to be my all time favorite game EVER in it‚Äôs category of action/RPG. If you‚Äôre on the fence on whether you should buy this game, do it! You won‚Äôt regret it! This game is üíØ% pure AWESOMENESS! üëÅ give it 4 thumbs üëÜüèª! üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

From the hilarious dialogues to the intense battles, this game is by far the BEST game that you will come across. Or at least my favorite. Devs please keep doing what you‚Äôre doing. If you don‚Äôt purchase this game you‚Äôll regret it.

Look at the other reviews...they aren‚Äôt your standard fare bot generated crap.  They‚Äôre all from real people and this game still has a 4.8* rating, the vast majority of us love it.   Read the low star reviews.  Many of them are for fickle complaints that pale in comparison to the awesomeness of this game.  I played it over a year ago and got more enjoyment from it and invested more time in it than I have $60+ AAA titles. You can‚Äôt go wrong here.  Get the game, play it, love it.  Seriously.

I have always loved this game, but ever since the last update, I‚Äôve noticed that my map would black out after a while, and I could never get it lit up again!
Please, Butterscotch, if you‚Äôre reading this, fix this issue soon!
Thanks, Crashlands is SATISFYING otherwise!
Actually best game I‚Äôve ever played UwU

I am currently in the tundra area and was doing the feed an army quest and I used the acidic fish bait before talking to the person again and now it won‚Äôt acknowledge that I completed the quest and it is a main story quest and I can‚Äôt destroy the fish schools to redo the quest
What do I do?

title.label: Wish the ‚Äúeasiest‚Äù mode was actually easy

content.label: I want to love this game but get frustrated every time I give it a go. I get to the first few bosses and die easily unless I grind like crazy to get the best gear. I only have an hour or so of game time a day and that is not enough time for this game, sadly.
Please make a sequel

This game could have been perfect. But WHY do you do difficulty settings. I can‚Äôt choose easy because it‚Äôs too easy, the game should be played on normal but then the whole time you‚Äôre wondering why you didn‚Äôt choose hard. This is my pet peeve in gaming. DONT GIVE ME THE OPTION. I chose hard out of pride but you can‚Äôt out gear the bosses!?? What is the point in weapon and gear farming when you can‚Äôt do that?? Just have ONE setting in between normal and hard. Take away the choice! It‚Äôs frustrating.

When I heard that creative mode came out, I was super excited. I had stopped playing for a while because Barry was so hard, and I had been wanting creative for a LONG time. When I found out you had to complete the game to get creative, I was so disappointed to the point where I just deleted the game. If you could make creative accessible to everyone that would be great. Please fix this.
-MerpTop

I've been looking for a survival game with almost infinite play time and guess what I've found! No other kind of games could make me play a mobile phone game for a whole day. Sure the game has some drawbacks, but overall, Crashland is a perfect game.
This game is literally the only good story slash sandbox game ive played.
This is a great game which I am quite frankly addicted to and I literally can‚Äôt stop playing. Totally recommend this game, go play it

title.label: Truly a 5 star BUT... Please add...

content.label: There‚Äôs a lack of something VITAL and simple... the game seriously has everything. It has a storyline that‚Äôs engaging. A crafting system that rivals and outdoes many! Crashlands is a game you can get lost and involved in. I love the battle system but it needs work. The enemies are balanced, but the serious issue here is just one update away. I beg, plead, ask, and long for the game devs to add a simple virtual joystick please. Fighting multiple enemies is not fun when the character decides to run straight into a preset path after you tap?! Please let me have control over the character!!! Other than that it‚Äôs seriously a 5 star game. The same was asked of Stardew Valley and a week later... BAM 5 star review and a loyal fan!

This game is a lot of fun to play. There is a ton of content and plenty to do. However, the sound design and music score for the game are both so horrendous that it makes me want to stop playing altogether. The opening sound is one of the most annoying noises in the world (‚Äúbutterscotch shenanigans‚Äù) and the score will become fatiguing very quickly. It‚Äôs clear that very little thought went into the sound aspect of the game, which is very disappointing and really shows. As fun as the game is, this is one of few games that the sound design actually stood out due to how poorly constructed it is.
This game really is amazing it‚Äôs probably the best one I‚Äôve ever gotten it‚Äôs funny progressive the story is also amazing and has plenty of content definitely worth it

It‚Äôs a great game. However, the controls for fighting are not that great... is there anyway to change them? I‚Äôd rather tap some kind of pad than having to click on the monster than click outside its attack range than click back on the monster. It can be rather cumbersome.

I love the game, I bought it on a recommendation from a friend and it was everything she said it would be. 

However, the pathing is a bit clumsy. If I am on one side of a pond and click on the other side, the pathing should recognize that I want to go around, not have me walk to the edge and stop. Also during fights I find that the ‚Äúbox‚Äù on the mob is far to small, you have to tap just right or you just end up running at them and more times than not end up right on top of an attack (this happens a lot with ranged items). If I click anywhere on the body it should attack, not assume I didn‚Äôt mean to attack and just wanted to run right in. 

Overall I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys games like don‚Äôt starve, If you have played don‚Äôt starve and have said I just wish I could play without having to worry about eating every 30 seconds or lose everything I worked for for the last 15 hours, this game is exactly what you want.

title.label: Crashlands Review: A truly hilarious masterpiece

content.label:
When I had first seen the trailer for this game at a friends house, I was intrigued. A game that let me roam a 2d ish world where I could craft and smash my way through crazy looking aliens and laugh along the way? I got the game and I can tell you it doesn‚Äôt disappoint! 

Here are some pros and cons.

Pros:
-The combat aspect of the game is fantastic. 
-Crafting in the game is challenging, requiring you to do some exploring and in some cases, hunting. 
-Weapons are fun to use and are all around great and balanced.
-The worlds you explore are colorful, creative, and massive. 
-The NPC‚Äôs that you interact with are funny and likable.

Cons:
-Movement can be cumbersome sometimes. I‚Äôm not sure if there is a joystick option, but the tapping around can be a tad inaccurate. 
-(this depends on how challenging you like your games to be) THIS GAME IS NOT A PICK UP AND PLAY. You might need a wiki. This can be a pro or a con for some people. Personally I like a challenge. 

Overall rating: 10/10

This is a game that will keep me coming back time and time again. I love everything about this game. And even though the movement can be cumbersome at times, it‚Äôs still an enjoyable, hilarious, and challenging game that will satisfy my mobile gaming hunger.
The game deserves a 3 star because of the survival taste of the game, 1 more star for the characters because they are so funny, 1 more star for story the story is just really good

So when I play the new coop mode with my cousins I can‚Äôt because we don‚Äôt know what it means by controller.Cant we play on touch screen split screen.I like this game but I‚Äôm just suggesting this
I loved the fast paced game and amazing crafting system. If there is another game like this soon I will definitely buy it! Thank you so much

In my opinion, this should be rated THE #1 survival game, but the story I think is awesome and has a reason, just being a package deliverer, you would have thought she‚Äôd already be dead, but no, you are crazy op outside of the insane mode, it‚Äôs so fun, I hope this game is updated for years to come.
Why is this NOT on Apple TV yet?

I just got the email today saying how to guys are getting the game on the switch and how your going to make it multiplayer! Is that update just going to be for the switch or all devices? Also thanks for this update! IK earlier in the game people ask about this and you guys said it probably wouldn't happen because you'd have to recode the entire game! Thanks for doing though!

I usually don‚Äôt write reviews, but I have to for this. This game is a work of art. Way better that those paintings at art museums, including the solid blue one. This is a must have. Once I finish the game I will be so sad that it ended. The story is awesome, the jokes are awesome, and there are so many amazing ideas.
5 stars isn‚Äôt enough to express how much I love this game. I am so happy I don‚Äôt have to sort my inventory. This takes my mind off of all the bad things happening. The music is awesome. The different areas are very cool. Thank you Butterscotch Shenanigans for making Crashlands.

title.label: I can‚Äôt equip sunshrooms or baconflowers

content.label: Idk if it‚Äôs a bug or what, I can‚Äôt eat sunshrooms or baconflowers and they are not even showing up in my inventory.
I‚Äôve played a ton of phone games, and this one of the top greatest Ive ever played. Easy to play for hours at once and it‚Äôs just very good. 5 Big Kahunas.

title.label: To butterscotch shenanigans and it‚Äôs fans

content.label:
I love this game in all its unholy raging glory
And I was reading the reviews that people submitted and I saw that every complaint that they had was fixed, for example ‚ÄúI keep accidentally tapping on juice box in combat which was the cause of many deaths‚Äù so to fix it they made juice box teleport away when in combat, another player wanted the item tracking system so they added that too
This is exactly what I love about certain game companies, they listen to the fans and they aren‚Äôt afraid to use the recommendations that people give them

title.label: Love this game, please make another!

content.label:
This game is an absolute joy to play. I was consumed by this game; Playing for weeks nonstop until I completed the story and unlocked everything. After everything was maxed out and nothing left to beat, it slowly became less addictive. 

So much fun to build you own house and furniture and craft things and level them up. 

Super fun RPG! Please make another!

I absolutely adore this game, the combat is fun, the quests are compelling, and every little bit of advancement makes me happy inside.
However, there's one huge problem with it... I can't play it. Every time I try to open the app, teleport, or embiggen a pet, the game has a high chance of crashing. This is a serious problem and absolutely needs to be fixed.
Very nifty indeed, l like the addition of axes and hammers earlygame, for future updates, maybe the oceans of wanoepe, forgot the name of the planet. Oops

title.label: ONE OF THE BEST GAMES MADE/PLAYED

content.label: I heard about this game through the Dev Diary documentary on Prime so I gave it a try and WOW. I was hooked right away. It's one of those rare games that no matter how long you play it, the second you put it down you want to pick it back up and play. Truly a rarity in games. The story behind it is awesome as well! I can't praise this one enough. Games are my life, so I feel am I am qualified to say, this is one of the best games I've ever played! GREAT JOB DEVS!!! Ok, enough typing, time to get back to playing some CRASHLANDS!!
I like how there is everything from boss battles to fishing to a story! Also the comedy is great! 11/10

Love the game but I wish there was multiplayer so me and my friend or my brother or sister can play with me it would be greatly appreciated if you guys add multiplayer also add more to items to the savanna because so there‚Äôs more thing to do because bawg is like the only place for quests when you get there.

Crashlands is a gem. The graphics, story, and controls are polished and thoughtful. This title would be right at home on a console, but we‚Äôre lucky enough to have it on iOS. It‚Äôs rare to see this level of quality on a mobile device. Congrats to the team at Butterscotch shenanigans, Crashlands is an amazing game!

First of all, I really like this game. It has a fun atmosphere and solid gameplay mechanics. HOWEVER, it is also a huge battery hog. My phone is usually almost dead after I play it over a bus ride! I understand that this game is taxing, and while I can‚Äôt play it, I eagerly await a console release so I can.

TL;DR: Great game, but is a battery hog
So much fun to play and level up!
Great game
Yes for so long I tried to find a game exactly like this this game is definitely worth buying keep up the great work

For a small crew, you all put together a really fun and engaging game!

Hot bar detection is still an issue, but not a big one.  

I like that you fixed the problem with the flying robot getting in the middle of battles! That is a huge relief. 

Overall 5 stars and well worth the money! 

Would like to see expansions in the future!
Love the game but would like to see another land or maybe another planet
